Function reference

Growth classification

Classify growth data into commonly used growth indicators.

classify_sfga()
Classify size for gestational age using the INTERGROWTH-21st weight-for-gestational age standard
classify_svn()
Classify small vulnerable newborns according to the INTERGROWTH-21st weight-for-gestational age standard
classify_stunting()
Classify stunting using WHO or INTERGROWTH-21st length/height-for-age standards
classify_wasting()
Classify wasting using INTERGROWTH-21st weight-for-length or WHO weight-for-length/height standards
classify_wfa()
Classify weight-for-age using WHO or INTERGROWTH-21st standards

INTERGROWTH-21st Newborn Size Standards

Conversion functions for the INTERGROWTH-21st Newborn Size Standards.

ig_nbs_value2centile() ig_nbs_wfga_value2centile() ig_nbs_lfga_value2centile() ig_nbs_hcfga_value2centile() ig_nbs_wlrfga_value2centile() ig_nbs_fmfga_value2centile() ig_nbs_bfpfga_value2centile() ig_nbs_ffmfga_value2centile() ig_nbs_value2zscore() ig_nbs_wfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_lfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_hcfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_wlrfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_fmfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_bfpfga_value2zscore() ig_nbs_ffmfga_value2zscore()
Convert values to z-scores/centiles in the INTERGROWTH-21st Newborn Size Standards
ig_nbs_centile2value() ig_nbs_wfga_centile2value() ig_nbs_lfga_centile2value() ig_nbs_hcfga_centile2value() ig_nbs_wlrfga_centile2value() ig_nbs_fmfga_centile2value() ig_nbs_bfpfga_centile2value() ig_nbs_ffmfga_centile2value() ig_nbs_zscore2value() ig_nbs_wfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_lfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_hcfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_wlrfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_fmfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_bfpfga_zscore2value() ig_nbs_ffmfga_zscore2value()
Convert z-scores/centiles to values in the INTERGROWTH-21st Newborn Size Standards

INTERGROWTH-21st Postnatal Growth Standards for Preterm Infants

Conversion functions for the INTERGROWTH-21st Postnatal Growth Standards for Preterm Infants.

ig_png_value2zscore() ig_png_wfa_value2zscore() ig_png_lfa_value2zscore() ig_png_hcfa_value2zscore() ig_png_wfl_value2zscore() ig_png_value2centile() ig_png_wfa_value2centile() ig_png_lfa_value2centile() ig_png_hcfa_value2centile() ig_png_wfl_value2centile()
Convert values to z-scores/centiles in the INTERGROWTH-21st Postnatal Growth Standards for preterm infants
ig_png_zscore2value() ig_png_wfa_zscore2value() ig_png_lfa_zscore2value() ig_png_hcfa_zscore2value() ig_png_wfl_zscore2value() ig_png_centile2value() ig_png_wfa_centile2value() ig_png_lfa_centile2value() ig_png_hcfa_centile2value() ig_png_wfl_centile2value()
Convert z-scores/centiles to values in the INTERGROWTH-21st Postnatal Growth Standards for preterm infants

INTERGROWTH-21st Fetal Standards

Conversion functions for the INTERGROWTH-21st Fetal Standards.

ig_fet_value2zscore() ig_fet_hcfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_bpdfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_acfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_flfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_ofdfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_efwfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_sfhfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_crlfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_gafcrl_value2zscore() ig_fet_gwgfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_pifga_value2zscore() ig_fet_rifga_value2zscore() ig_fet_sdrfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_tcdfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_gaftcd_value2zscore() ig_fet_poffga_value2zscore() ig_fet_sffga_value2zscore() ig_fet_avfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_pvfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_cmfga_value2zscore() ig_fet_value2centile() ig_fet_hcfga_value2centile() ig_fet_bpdfga_value2centile() ig_fet_acfga_value2centile() ig_fet_flfga_value2centile() ig_fet_ofdfga_value2centile() ig_fet_efwfga_value2centile() ig_fet_sfhfga_value2centile() ig_fet_crlfga_value2centile() ig_fet_gafcrl_value2centile() ig_fet_gwgfga_value2centile() ig_fet_pifga_value2centile() ig_fet_rifga_value2centile() ig_fet_sdrfga_value2centile() ig_fet_tcdfga_value2centile() ig_fet_gaftcd_value2centile() ig_fet_poffga_value2centile() ig_fet_sffga_value2centile() ig_fet_avfga_value2centile() ig_fet_pvfga_value2centile() ig_fet_cmfga_value2centile()

WHO Child Growth Standards

Conversion functions for the WHO Child Growth Standards.

who_gs_value2zscore() who_gs_wfa_value2zscore() who_gs_bfa_value2zscore() who_gs_lhfa_value2zscore() who_gs_wfl_value2zscore() who_gs_wfh_value2zscore() who_gs_hcfa_value2zscore() who_gs_acfa_value2zscore() who_gs_ssfa_value2zscore() who_gs_tsfa_value2zscore() who_gs_value2centile() who_gs_wfa_value2centile() who_gs_bfa_value2centile() who_gs_lhfa_value2centile() who_gs_wfl_value2centile() who_gs_wfh_value2centile() who_gs_hcfa_value2centile() who_gs_acfa_value2centile() who_gs_ssfa_value2centile() who_gs_tsfa_value2centile()
Convert values to z-scores/centiles in the WHO Child Growth Standards
who_gs_zscore2value() who_gs_wfa_zscore2value() who_gs_bfa_zscore2value() who_gs_lhfa_zscore2value() who_gs_wfl_zscore2value() who_gs_wfh_zscore2value() who_gs_hcfa_zscore2value() who_gs_acfa_zscore2value() who_gs_ssfa_zscore2value() who_gs_tsfa_zscore2value() who_gs_centile2value() who_gs_wfa_centile2value() who_gs_bfa_centile2value() who_gs_lhfa_centile2value() who_gs_wfl_centile2value() who_gs_wfh_centile2value() who_gs_hcfa_centile2value() who_gs_acfa_centile2value() who_gs_ssfa_centile2value() who_gs_tsfa_centile2value()
Convert z-scores/centiles to values in the WHO Child Growth Standards

INTERGROWTH-21st Estimation Functions

Estimation functions from the INTERGROWTH-21st Project.

ig_fet_estimate_fetal_weight()
Estimate fetal weight in grams using the INTERGROWTH-21st predictive equation
ig_fet_estimate_ga()
Estimate gestational age using INTERGROWTH-21st predictive equations

Reference data and coefficient tables

Lists containing data frames with growth curve data, model parameters for WHO and some INTERGROWTH-21st standards, and data from the LIFE study.

ig_nbs
INTERGROWTH-21st Newborn Size Standards (including very preterm) growth curve data
ig_nbs_coeffs
INTERGROWTH-21st Newborn Size Standards GAMLSS coefficients
ig_png
INTERGROWTH-21st Postnatal Growth Standards growth curve data
ig_fet
INTERGROWTH-21st Fetal Standards growth curve data
who_gs
WHO Child Growth Standards growth curve data
who_gs_coeffs
WHO Child Growth Standards LMS coefficients
life6mo
Data extract from the Low birthweight Infant Feeding Exploration (LIFE) study

GIGS package options

Options for how gigs should handle missing or undefined data, and some out-of bounds values.

gigs_option_get() gigs_option_set()
Get and set gigs package options
